description: Get the speed of copying file between local disk and CIFS server.

parameters.name: CIFS server mount point
parameters.description: Specify the mount point of target CIFS server on each node if it's already mounted, or leave this value empty.

parameters.name: CIFS server connection string
parameters.description: Copy the connection string of target CIFS server from Azure portal if the above parameter 'CIFS server mount point' is not specified.

parameters.name: Mode
parameters.description: Select the way each node accessing target CIFS server.
